Package com.northeastern.labyrinth.Controller.Player

Interface IPlayer

All Known Implementing Classes:
AIPlayer, ProxyPlayer
public interface IPlayer
Represents the player programming interface used by the referee to communicate with a player.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    name()
    Gets the player's name.
    MazeBoard
    proposeBoard0(int rows, int columns)
    Prompts the player to propose a board with a min.
    void
    setup(Optional<IPlayerState> state0, Coordinate targetTile)
    Calls setup for a player according to the spec.
    Optional<Action>
    takeTurn(IPlayerState<PublicPlayerData> publicState)
    Prompts the player to execute a turn based on the given IPlayerState.
    void
    win(Boolean w)
    The player is informed whether it won or not.

  • Method Details

    • name

      String name()
      Gets the player's name. '

    • proposeBoard0

      MazeBoard proposeBoard0(int rows, int columns)
      Prompts the player to propose a board with a min. # of rows and columns
      Returns:
      the proposed maze board.

    • setup

      void setup(Optional<IPlayerState> state0, Coordinate targetTile)
      Calls setup for a player according to the spec.
      Parameters:
      state0 - the state of the game. Will be empty to tell player to go home.
      targetTile - the target tile for the player to try to reach.

    • takeTurn

      Optional<Action> takeTurn(IPlayerState<PublicPlayerData> publicState)
      Prompts the player to execute a turn based on the given IPlayerState.
      Parameters:
      publicState - the public state of the game.
      Returns:
      the action the player wants to take, or an empty optional if the player wants to pass.

    • win

      void win(Boolean w)
      The player is informed whether it won or not.
